data.name: Romeo Must Live Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Re-live the magic of "Romeo Must :ove" by purchasing the Original Soundtrack that features the music used in this game. Enjoy these folk and orchestral tacks and be transported to the Verona one more time! Remember the hilarious adventures and the feelings of falling in love!
